turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I want you to order dinner from Pizza Hut

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want two large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. What toppings do you want on the first one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get that one with sausage and onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Very good. And the second one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the second get it with mushrooms, green peppers, and onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, add a side order of breadsticks to that, they have the best there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yummy, yeah, they do have the best. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, make that sausage and onion a thin crust pizza, the other can remain the regular pan pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, so you want two large pizzas, one thin crust with sausage and onions and one pan with mushrooms, green peppers and onions and a side of breaksticks. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. I'll get this order in and let you know the details.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, the order is in and it will be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, how much did it cost?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Only about $25, I used one of the coupons, so not bad at all.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, really appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, that's what I'm here for.
